price: 150. То boye, tokelaki ba anzelu bazala basi mpe bango bazali kornona?
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثٗا وَهُمۡ شَٰهِدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqnā al-malāikata ināthan wahum shāhidūna
